subject: Another one no one in their right mind would comment on.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, whatever. See, I put myself out there, screw ego crap. Plus it shows
that none of us are who we think we are, this is one incarnation, one
physical body, and you don't keep it and the same ego/personality forever.
EVP is to demonstrate what comes after, not to inflate the ego of the here
and now.



 F-S
